silaceus	Eusphinctus (Nothosphinctus) silaceus 	Clark, 1924a: 77
steinheili	Sphinctomyrmex (Eusphinctus) steinheili 	Forel, 1900b: 72 
trux	Sphinctomyrmex trux 	Brown, 1975: 77
turneri	Sphinctomyrmex turneri 	Forel, 1900b: 70 
wilsoni	Zasphinctus wilsoni 	Hita Garcia, in Hita Garcia, Fischer, et al. 2017b: 51
albimaculata	Prenolepis gibberosa st. albimaculata 	Santschi, 1930e: 81 
cisipa	Paratrechina (Nylanderia) cisipa 	Smith, D.R. & Lavigne, 1973: 184
darlingtoni	Nylanderia darlingtoni 	Wheeler, W.M. 1936b: 210 
gibberosa	Prenolepis gibberosa 	Roger, 1863a: 161 
gloriosa	Zatania gloriosa 	LaPolla, Kallal & Brady, 2012: 210
karstica	Prenolepis karstica 	Fontenla Rizo, 2000: 84
rogeri	Prenolepis (Prenolepis) gibberosa var. rogeri 	Mann, 1920: 434
